urls.title: Council of Europe HELP
urls.description: Welcome to the Council of Europe HELP online platform! To enrol in any of the Council of Europe HELP courses for self-study, scroll down this page and click on the language code under the course picture. Once completed, you can print out a statement of accomplishment. HELP offers Tutored Courses. Click here if you are enrolled in a tutored course. Please contact your National Training Institution or Bar Association directly if you would like to take a tutored
